import { useState, useEffect, useContext } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Categories() { const [categories, setCategories] = useState(); const getAllcategories = () => { axios({ method: "GET", withCredentials: true, url: "http://localhost:4000/api/getallcategories", }) .then((res) => { console.log(res); console.log(res.data.row); }) .catch((error) => { console.log(error); }); }; useEffect(() => { getAllcategories(); }, []); return ( <>
